title: Development of land partly shown as / existing amenity: Where a building exists on a site shown as existing amenity in the DP, only its appropriate part of land as used for such existing amenity , shall be used for the said purpose and the remaining part of the land/building of the developable land may be put to use in conformity with the purpose of development as otherwise permissible in these Regulations
clause_text: Development of land partly shown as / existing amenity: Where a building exists on a site shown as existing amenity in the DP, only its appropriate part of land as used for such existing amenity , shall be used for the said purpose and the remaining part of the land/building of the developable land may be put to use in conformity with the purpose of development as otherwise permissible in these Regulations.
section: Development of the existing amenity/reservation/partly existing amenity/partly reserved/amenity Plot:
